title: 11 reasons robots struggle to scale in high-mix manufacturing
description:
Few robotics technologies have been actually deployed in high-mix applications. Let's explore the reasons behind this slow transition.

The post 11 reasons robots struggle to scale in high-mix manufacturing appeared first on The Robot Report.
